text: This national program is implemented on the guidance of President Maithripala Sirisena and Prime Minister Ranil wickremesinghe coinciding with the birthday celebration of Minister of Lands and Parliamentary Reforms and Chief Government Whip of Parliament Gayantha Karunatileke, which falls today (21st Aug.).The inauguration ceremony of the national program to hand over title deeds for the people, who didnt have them for a long period of time will be held today (21st Aug.) in Elpitiya under the patronage of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe. This national program is implemented on the guidance of President Maithripala Sirisena and Prime Minister Ranil wickremesinghe coinciding with the birthday celebration of Minister of Lands and Parliamentary Reforms and Chief Government Whip of Parliament Gayantha Karunatileke, which falls today (21st Aug.).
title: Title deeds for landless Elpitiya residents
